about_the_game:
In this demo, you'll experience the early challenges of surviving in the wild without modern tools. The demo offers a limited feature set and progression compared to the full game. Saving is disabled, and both playtime and exploration are restricted.

The story starts when you find yourself stranded on a deserted island after being betrayed by an accomplice. With no one searching for you, you'll need to establish a base, gather gear, and keep yourself fed and hydrated while preparing for the colder seasons. Fire is your lifeline, and you must protect both yourself and your fire from the harsh elements. Every decision matters.

DEMO FEATURES

  • Experience summer and autumn seasons
  • Over 40 crafting recipes
  • Over 25 constructions and utilities
  • Customizable difficulty settings
  • Different animals and biomes

CRAFTING

With no modern tools at your disposal, everything must be crafted from natural resources. Craft primitive tools, create materials, and make clothing to survive. While advanced tools require more steps to craft, they provide a significant advantage in survival. As you level up, crafting becomes faster and more efficient.

BASE BUILDING


In order to build something you need a levelled ground. Start by establishing a simple shelter for your base. Later on build sturdy primitive structures to protect from harsh weather. Buildings provide additional benefits.

FOOD


Effective food management is crucial for survival, especially on a deserted island. Forage for vegetables in the forests and cultivate seeds for higher yields. Use traps and snares for passive hunting, and set up a fishtrap to secure vital calories in the early days. With well-trained archery skills, you can hunt animals directly for a more reliable food source.

WOOD


Sticks, wood pieces, and twigs are scattered throughout the map, but chopping down a tree provides a much greater yield.


Happy surviving!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 1700X 3 GHz or similar
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 580 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 CPU 4.5 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060 or AMD 6700 XT
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible

short_description: Bushcraft and survive on a deserted island where nature is both your greatest ally and fiercest adversary. As the weather turns colder toward winter, preparation becomes key to survival. Build shelters, hunt, fish, farm, and craft items from natural resources—all without any modern tools.
